description: "Hashtags allow you to categorize your dots using quick, flexible labels. By adding hashtags directly inside your dot or comment, you can group related topics, track tasks, highlight priorities, and make content easier to search."

## üìù How to use Hashtags

üßæNavigate to the dot where you want to add a hashtag.

‚å®Ô∏è In the comment box or annotation bar, type # to activate the hashtag field.

üè∑Ô∏è Write a new hashtag name to create it instantly, or Select an existing hashtag from the dropdown suggestions.

üìå Once entered, the hashtag is automatically added to the dot and becomes searchable.

üåÄ Any dots using the same hashtag will appear grouped in the Hashtag view or search filter.

üîé Use the Hashtag Cloud to quickly find all dots connected to the same tag.

‚úèÔ∏è You can add multiple hashtags to a dot to create richer filtering and categorization.

::div{class="flex w-full justify-center max-w-6xl mx-auto h-120 py-4"}
:video{src="/hashtags.mp4" class="rounded-md object-cover w-full h-full" controls autoplay muted loop}
::

### üí° Tips

* Use hashtags to track themes like #BugReport, #UIReview, #Sprint12, or #Priority.

* Keep hashtags consistent across the team to maintain clean organization.

* Short, clear hashtags work best ‚Äî avoid long phrases.
